an5.64:1.1: “Pancahi, bhikkhave, vaddhihi vaddhamana ariyasavika ariyaya vaddhiya vaddhati, saradayini ca hoti varadayini ca kayassa.
an5.64:1.3: Saddhaya vaddhati, silena vaddhati, sutena vaddhati, cagena vaddhati, pannaya vaddhati—
an5.64:1.4: imahi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi vaddhihi vaddhamana ariyasavika ariyaya vaddhiya vaddhati, saradayini ca hoti varadayini ca kayassati.
